module.name: seedlink
module.description: Real-time waveform server implementing the SeedLink protocol.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Defines the Seedlink port to accept requests. If this port is changed and other modules depend on it (slarchive, processing) those ports must be updated as well!

parameter.name: filebase
parameter.description: Path to the base directory of SeedLink data files (disk buffer).

parameter.name: network
parameter.description: Default network code. Used when a network code is omitted by a client in STATION request. Should be set to the network code of the majority of configured stations. 1 or 2 characters long, uppercase.

parameter.name: trusted
parameter.description: List of trusted addresses.

parameter.name: access
parameter.description: List of IP addresses or IP/mask pairs (in ipchains/iptables syntax) that can access stations. Per station access definitions supersede this parameter. By default any client can access all stations.

parameter.name: stream_check
parameter.description: Check start and end times of streams.

parameter.name: gap_check_pattern
parameter.description: If stream_check = enabled, also check for gaps in all channels that match given pattern. Register all gaps that are larger than +-0.5 seconds. gap_check_pattern = [EBLV][HLNG][ZNE]|S[NG][ZNE]. Disabled to save memory.

parameter.name: gap_treshold
parameter.description: Time difference between records (microseconds) above which a gap is declared.

parameter.name: window_extraction
parameter.description: Can be enabled or disabled. Required for slinktool option -tw.

parameter.name: window_extraction_trusted
parameter.description: Same as window_extraction for trusted IP addresses.

parameter.name: websocket
parameter.description: Allow websocket connections.

parameter.name: websocket_trusted
parameter.description: Same as websocket for trusted IP addresses.

parameter.name: msrtsimul
parameter.description: If activated Seedlink uses the mseedfifo to read records and only the mseedfifo_plugin is started. This command is useful to playback historic data by eg msrtsimul.

parameter.name: inventory_connection
parameter.description: Defines a database read connection to be used for Seedlink station descriptions. If no database is to be used (the default; configure with "") then the station code will be used. Example: "mysql://sysop:sysop@localhost/seiscomp3". If a remote host is specified, ensure that its database server is reachable from this computer.

parameter.name: info
parameter.description: Info level provided to arbitrary hosts.

parameter.name: info_trusted
parameter.description: Info level provided to trusted hosts.

parameter.name: request_log
parameter.description: Whether requests should be logged.

parameter.name: proc_gap_warn
parameter.description: Give warning if an input channel has time gap larger than this (microseconds).

parameter.name: proc_gap_flush
parameter.description: Flush streams if an input channel has time gap larger than this (microseconds).

parameter.name: proc_gap_reset
parameter.description: Reset FIR filters if an input channel has time gap larger than this (microseconds).

parameter.name: backfill_buffer
parameter.description: Enable backfilling buffer for out-of-order records. This values defines its capacity in seconds.

parameter.name: seq_gap_limit
parameter.description: Maximum allowed deviation from the sequence number of oldest packet if packet with requested sequence number is not found. If seq_gap_limit is exceeded, data flow starts from the next packet coming in, otherwise from the oldest packet in buffer.

parameter.name: connections
parameter.description: Total number of TCP/IP connections allowed.

parameter.name: connections_per_ip
parameter.description: Maximum number of TCP/IP connections per IP.

parameter.name: bytespersec
parameter.description: Maximum speed per connection (0: throttle disabled).

parameter.name: lockfile
parameter.description: Path to lockfile to prevent multiple instances.

parameter.name: buffers
parameter.description: Size of memory buffer (number of recent Mini-SEED records kept in RAM).

parameter.name: segments
parameter.description: Number of disk buffer segments (files under <dir>/station/segments/ where <dir> is the directory given by the filebase parameter).

parameter.name: segsize
parameter.description: Size of one disk buffer segment in the records (512-byte units).

parameter.name: blanks
parameter.description: Number of blank records to insert after the re-scan of disk buffer if <dir>/station/buffer.xml is not found (assuming the server did not terminate correctly).

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: Encoding of Mini-SEED records created by SeedLink. The value must be steim1 or steim2. If omitted, the global encoding parameter is used.

parameter.name: sequence_file_cleanup
parameter.description: If configured with a value greater than zero then all sequence files created by the chain plugin are deleted which are older than X minutes before Seedlink is started.

binding.description:
Configures general station parameters irrespective of a configured plugin.
If stream_check, gap_check_pattern or gap_treshold is changed it is necessary to remove the files <dir>/*/buffer.xml, where <dir> is the directory given by the filebase parameter. In this case the disk buffer is re-scanned when SeedLink is started (which will take some time).

parameter.name: access
parameter.description: List of IP addresses or IP/mask pairs (in ipchains/iptables syntax). Only if a client's IP address matches one of those the station is shown (slinktool -L, etc.) and accessible. If omitted, the global access parameter is used. If the global access parameter is not set any client can access the station.

parameter.name: buffers
parameter.description: Size of memory buffer (number of recent Mini-SEED records kept in RAM).

parameter.name: segments
parameter.description: Number of disk buffer segments (files under <dir>/station/segments/ where <dir> is the directory given by the filebase parameter).

parameter.name: segsize
parameter.description: Size of one disk buffer segment in the records (512-byte units).

parameter.name: blanks
parameter.description: Number of blank records to insert after the re-scan of disk buffer if <dir>/station/buffer.xml is not found (assuming the server did not terminate correctly).

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: Encoding of Mini-SEED records created by SeedLink. The value must be steim1 or steim2. If omitted, the global encoding parameter is used.

parameter.name: backfill_buffer
parameter.description: Enable backfilling buffer for out-of-order records when raw samples are transmitted. This values defines its capacity in seconds.
